Elon Musk wants to change the world we live in.De facto, everything Elon Musk says is listened to.Unlike other CEOs, Elon Musk has always been very close to his followers on social networks. He communicates in a direct way on Twitter to share his more or less crazy thoughts with more than 47 million followers.When Elon Musk talks about Dogecoin, everyone apparently takes his words seriously.Even though he said he was joking with Dogecoin, some people don't understand him at all. This triggers Pump & Dump movements on this cryptocurrency which is nothing but a joke.Elon Musk is so influential that he manages to do almost the same on Bitcoin by sending contradictory messages. He supports Bitcoin and then says that Bitcoin is almost as "bullshit" as fiat money.The best advice I can give you is not to attach too much importance to what Elon Musk says about cryptocurrencies.This will save you time and money.
